name: pong. (C3P File included)
description:
My attempt at recreating Pong in Construct 3 on my own. The only experience I have with C3 is following the Beginner Tutorial that Construct has and a little bit of Vimlark's Rock Smacker Tutorial. I am also a complete noob when it comes to coding. Any advice on how I handled the coding would be greatly appreciated!

It's worth noting that I couldn't figure out how to make the enemy paddle actually... work (0. 0"). I just pinned it to follow the Y-axis of the ball and made the goal of the game to get the highest score possible
